name: Degreed
description:
Degreed is a technology suite that combines lifelong learning and data-driven development so organizations can accelerate workforce capabilities for greater impact and make skills the heart of all work.

Degreed is the only learning platform that makes it easy for companies to deliver daily learning, deep skill-building, education benefits, real-time insights and expert services, while connecting to a robust network of partners and integrations.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Welcome to the skills-first revolution

Highlights.name: Leaning Experience Platform
Highlights.description: Unleash the power of skills-based learning

Highlights.name: Degreed Academies
Highlights.description: Plan and deliver targeted skill development programs

enhanced_description: Degreed is a comprehensive HR technology suite designed to revolutionize workforce capabilities through a skills-first, data-driven approach. It functions as a leading Learning Experience Platform (LXP) and upskilling platform, enabling organizations to deliver daily learning, foster deep skill-building, manage education benefits, and gain real-time insights into learning progress. The platform supports continuous learning, skill acquisition, and personalized learning pathways, enhancing overall training effectiveness and learning efficiency. Key components include Degreed Academies for planning and delivering targeted skill development programs and a Content Marketplace for effective, equitable, and flexible skill-building, all connected through a robust network of partners and integrations.
key_use_cases: Making skills central to organizational work
Delivering daily and continuous learning experiences
Providing real-time insights and analytics on learning and skills
Planning and delivering targeted skill development programs through Degreed Academies
Enabling personalized learning pathways and experiences
competitive_advantages: Pioneering a 'skills-first revolution' approach to learning and development
Combines lifelong learning with data-driven development for accelerated workforce capabilities
Claimed unique capability to deliver daily learning, deep skill-building, education benefits, real-time insights, and expert services within a single learning platform
Offers a robust network of partners and integrations
Provides real-time insights into skill development and learning progress
integration_capabilities: Robust network of general partners and integrations
roi_benefits: Accelerated workforce capabilities and organizational impact
primary_users: Employees (for personalized learning and skill acquisition)
Managers (for overseeing team development and accessing insights)
Organizational Leaders (for strategic workforce capability acceleration)
